column1: purchase, that is from 29.03.1993 to 13.02.1994. The Respondent moved for a dismissal
of the action, a declaration that he was the owner of the corpus and an order of ejectment
against the Appellant and all those claiming under him.
After trial, the learned District Judge dismissed the action of the Appellant and  granted
the relief claimed by the Respondent.
The  Appellant  appealed  to  the  Provincial  High  Court  of  the  Western  Province  (Civil
Appellate) holden at Gampaha which was dismissed.
